name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Since we can realize that "there is no country without some negative things", why do we think that others are traitors or spies when we see them posting something negative?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As for those who confuse the country with the government and confuse negative information against the government with smearing China, this is a topic that I am too lazy to refute, but I just happened to use this opportunity to say something from my heart.
I am very pleased and proud that many of the things that have been sent out will eventually be resolved (although sometimes it is the contributors who are resolved), which shows that public opinion supervision is valuable, meaningful, and useful. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 1, the number of applicants for the college entrance examination in China hit a new high, reaching 12.91 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 1, Qu Weiguo, a professor at Fudan University, wrote an article lamenting the lack of security checks at South Korean subways and train stations, and was accused of "public intellectuals elevating the lack of security checks at subways to a cultural level."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A Xiaohongshu netizen posted that if his unit does not meet the standards of Xuexi Qiangguo, it will be deducted money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"Look at the common people"
On June 1, a video called "People" became popular on Bilibili
The hardships and happiness of ordinary people in the video resonated with a large number of netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the video went viral, the author was accused of "500,000" and the video was restricted. However, the comment area was still occupied by rational netizens.
"If you see this video and think the author is divisive, it means you are far away from the people"
"The pride in the country's growing prosperity and the disappointment in their own lives are tearing apart the sense of belonging of the middle and lower classes"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 1, Shanghai Zhongqiao Vocational and Technical University forced all students to empty their dormitories so that they could rent them out to outside summer camps for profit. Regardless of whether students could take anything away, they were required to empty their dormitories or else their personal belongings would be thrown away as garbage, which caused strong dissatisfaction among students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 2, multiple sources reported that the mother of the child in the previous "primary school student was hit and killed by the teacher's car in school" incident fell to her death.
It is reported that suffering from severe online violence was one of the important reasons for her suicide.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 1, a netizen posted a video showing that all villagers in a village in Hainan collectively voted to recall a village cadre. After the recall was successful, they cheered, rang gongs and set off firecrackers to celebrate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 2, Douyin issued an internal notice to major KOLs and brands, requiring them to prohibit promotion on the 3rd, 4th, and 5th
Comments and reposts are strictly prohibited from containing elements such as "lighting candles", "numbers with unclear meanings", "tanks", "old photos", "Hong Kong artists such as Jackie Chan/Alan Tam/Eric Tsang/Anita Mui", "including crowds/Victoria Harbour/Tiananmen Square/Summer Palace/candlelight/objects lined up in a row".
At the same time, the number of reposts, comments, and likes must not be sensitive numbers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
On June 2, a university in Jilin recruited volunteers to conduct security patrols on the campus on the nights of the 3rd and 4th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
It was reported online that after the child's mother jumped off the building, the child's father also jumped off the building and was later carried out on a stretcher.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 2, a knife attack occurred in Hollywood Plaza, Hong Kong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen added
The child's mother had complained before her death that she had been condemned and threatened by police officers from the Public Security Bureau.
Some netizens believed that she and her husband jumped off the building one after another because of the pressure from relevant departments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 2, an attempted murder occurred at China University of Geosciences in Wuhan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 2, a stabbing incident occurred in Chengxingyuan, Yuelu District, Changsha City
The attacker stabbed the victim to death and fled to the rooftop of a nearby building

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Breaking news! Wuhan Jiangxia District Guanggu No. 15 Primary School, at this moment.
Because the primary school is going to be diverted, parents collectively protested tonight, shouting "Enroll in the nearest school, oppose diversion."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Then, the parents took to the streets

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the video, the parents continued to march. Police cars had arrived at the scene but did not stop the march.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some people spontaneously joined the parade, and the people on the scene continued to march on the street

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The people kept shouting to go to the Education Bureau.
The police came to negotiate and hoped that the people would elect representatives.
The people responded, "We don't have representatives, we are speaking for ourselves."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The procession continued to move towards the Education Bureau.
The police on the scene did not interfere.
There were almost no vehicles on the road, probably because they were evacuated and controlled in advance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to on-site feedback, the parade has split into two groups: one group went to Guanggu Avenue, and the other group returned to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, at the school gate, the police are negotiating with the parents. The school has not yet come forward.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A staff member at the scene said that the person in charge of education (didn't understand) would come to the school immediately to listen to everyone's demands.
Now (didn't understand) the bureau staff and the education bureau leaders are negotiating a solution and will come soon.
